lead_paragraph: Bengals running back Giovani Bernard has a torn anterior cruciate ligament, but star receiver A.J. Green might be able to return from a hamstring injury this season, coach Marvin Lewis said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Bengals Lose Bernard; A.J. Green Could Be Back in Weeks
headline.main: Bengals Lose Bernard; A.J. Green Could Be Back in Weeks

snippet: Bengals running back Giovani Bernard has a torn anterior cruciate ligament, but star receiver A.J. Green might be able to return from a hamstring injury this season, coach Marvin Lewis said on Monday....
